# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal: Traps and Strainers

### Publication Details

* Reference: cb-924-18374578
* Tender Number: W8482-253117/A
* Publication Date: November 1, 2024
* Closing Date: December 2, 2024 at 14:00:00

### Tender Overview

The Directorate Maritime Procurement of the Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the supply of Traps and Strainers. The delivery locations are CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.

### Items Required

* Item 1: STRAINER, SEDIMENT (GSIN: N4730, NSN: 21-9014256)
	+ Quantity: 4 units
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* Item 2: STRAINER, SEDIMENT (GSIN: N4730, NSN: 21-9014256)
	+ Quantity: 4 units
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia

### Suppliers Requirements

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE.
* The requirement does not offer exchange rate fluctuation risk mitigation.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the criteria specified in the Tender Documents.

### Submission Requirements

* Persons interested in responding to this Notice should download the Tender Documents from the Canada Buy Service website.
* Tenderers must sign and date the Tender before submitting it to the Crown.
* The submission must be made before the Closing Date and Time indicated above.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Jean-Pierre Normandin, Contract Officer
* E-mail: [Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 939-3674

### Attachments

The Tender Package and Mandatory Tender Documents are available at the following URL:

[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50640/rfp-w8482-253117-a-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50640/rfp-w8482-253
